import { faClapperboard, faVideo } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' export default function BigAnimeCard({ Anime }) { return (
e.preventDefault()} className='h-full w-full object-cover object-top rounded' />

{Anime.Name}

★ {Anime.Rating}

{Anime.Describe}

Studio: {Anime.Studio}.

Thể loại: {Anime.Category}

) }
